update customer set customer_status = #{customerStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE FIND_IN_SET(id,#{ids})
mapper.select: select * from customer where id !=#{id} and document_num =#{docNum}
select * from customer where id !=#{id} and drive_num =#{driNum}

select * from customer where 1=1 and customer_status=#{code}
and `name` LIKE concat( concat ("%",#{name}),"%")
and link_telphone1 LIKE concat( concat ("%",#{phoneNum}),"%")
and drive_num LIKE concat( concat ("%",#{driveNum}),"%")
select * from customer where link_telphone1=#{phone} and password=#{password}
mapper.update: update customer set password =#{newPwd} where id=#{id} and link_telphone1=#{phone} and password=#{oldPwd}
mapper.select: select id,`name`,password from customer where id=#{id} and link_telphone1=#{phone}
select * from customer where id !=#{id} and link_telphone1 =#{telPhone}
SELECT D.DICT_CODE FROM DICT D WHERE D.DICT_NAME=#{driveType,jdbcType=VARCHAR};
